name: sftp-upload-file
description: Uploads a file or string in UTF-8 format to the SFTP server. [See the documentation](https://github.com/theophilusx/ssh2-sftp-client#org99d1b64)

data.description: Upload a string in UTF-8 format to the remote server.

remotePath.description: The path on the sftp server for store the data. e.g. `./uploads/my-file.txt`
